text: Deng Liqun (November 27, 1915 â€“ February 10, 2015) was a Chinese former official and high-ranking member of the Communist Party of China. Deng was born in Guidong County, Hunan province, and joined the Party in 1936. Later, he served as secretary to President Liu Shaoqi. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:Politicians from Hunan Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Deng Liqun
